attributes.action: Review the current procedure of helicopter Insurers treatment of survivors.
attributes.additional_details:
With the consistently accumulating amount of helicopter crashes yearly.
A urgent requirement and investigation into the need for an approved lawfully adhered to procedure for all helicopter operators and especially those who insurer these helicopter operators, be reviewed as to what current regulations and law and procedure they are held accountable under.
attributes.background: Review the current procedure of passenger helicopter operators and the Insurers procedure of the operators support emergency plan of victims families and the survivors treatment in the aftermath current crash plan.
